Question: ReactJS is an MVC based framework?

answers.answer: Answer - Be the life and soul of the party
Answer - Be calm, collected and always reliable

questions.question: Question: What are the advantages of React JS?

answers.answer: Answer - React can be used on client and as well as server side too
Answer - Using React increases readability and makes maintainability easier. Component, Data patterns improves readability and thus makes it easier for manitaining larger apps
Answer - React components have lifecycle events that fall into State/Property Updates
Answer - React can be used with any other framework (Backbone.js, Angular.js) as it is only a view layer

The Classic Connoisseur.description: You're a traditionalist who knows what you like and sticks to it. You appreciate the simple pleasures in life and find comfort in familiar flavors. Your loyalty and consistency make you a reliable friend and a creature of habit.

The Curious Taster.description: You're always eager to try new things and expand your palate. Your open-mindedness and adaptability make you an excellent companion for culinary adventures. You enjoy sharing experiences with others and are often the one introducing friends to new flavors.

The Adventurous Innovator.description: You see ice cream as a canvas for creativity and love pushing the boundaries of flavor combinations. Your enthusiasm for unique experiences is contagious, and you're always up for a food-related challenge. You're the life of the party and often surprise others with your bold choices.
